entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Snow level 1600 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:37 PM PST Friday 13 January 2023
